snippet: The quarterfinals of the African Cup of Nations will take place this weekend, with two games Saturday and two more on Sunday.
abstract: The quarterfinals of the African Cup of Nations will take place this weekend, with two games Saturday and two more on Sunday.
lead_paragraph: The quarterfinals of the African Cup of Nations will take place this weekend, with two games Saturday and two more on Sunday. Ivory Coast and Ghana remain the favorites to meet in the final, though the co-hosts Gabon (which went unbeaten in three first-round games) and Equatorial Guinea have each ridden home support to strong showings so far.
